Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps’ men ran out convincing 3-0 victors over Luxembourg in their first fixture of the month
Canada were crushed 4-0 by the Netherlands on Thursday evening
Others: This is France’s final friendly match before Euro 2024
Canada will be looking to give the home team a tough challenge as in their first international friendly they got hammered by the Dutch
The away team will have to give their best to even get a draw here
France have 1.20 odds in favour of winning this match, 6.40 odds in favour of the match ending in a draw and the away team have 12.00 odds in favour of them to win this fixture
India: Sony Sports Network, Sony Liv
